title: PLAT Player  Looking For Ranked Team Top / Mid Laner
body: Hello there i am currently GOLD 1 but am on the rise up of the ranks each week usually getting up a division or two :) I play Everything other than support however I also  have team experience before for a diamond team and well aware of what it takes and can probably make most training schedules, for that team i was their {{champion:122}} top laner main man usually carrying the hell out of games with my play making and good {{summoner:12}}  but would fill in as {{champion:119}} as adc or {{champion:238}} or {{champion:157}}  mid and jungle from time to time. I am a very energetic person but am able to tone it down and take things on board when needed and am able to listen to learn. All i ask is that you give me a chance and show you how good i really am. If you are interested please Hit me up if you would like on league! IGN: Filthy Schrank

replies.body: Added hope to hear from you soon :)
